name: components/core-badge/core-badge.js
CoreBadge
description: A number or status mark on buttons and icons.

name: constructor
description: Initialize private fields, shadowRoot and the view

name: max
description:
The maximum number that can be put in the badge
If the value field is a number larger than max field, `${max}+` will be displayed in the badge

name: isDot
description: If a little dot is displayed instead of the value

name: hidden
description: If the badge is displayed or not.

name: value
description:
The content that the badge tries to display but may not be the same as the acutal displayed content
when the value is a number larger than max field.

name: type
description: The type of the badge chosen from [primary, success, warning, info, danger]

name: content
description: The actual content to be displayed. It may be different from the given value because of max field.

name: _updateTemplate
description: Update the content of the transition element inside our template

name: components/core-button/core-button.js
observedAttributes
description: The list of attribute to observe

name: rounded
description: If the button has rounded corners

name: shadow
description: If the button has a border shadow

name: color
description: The color theme of the button

name: animated
description: If the button comes with an animated effect

params.name: toAdd
params.description: whether add the class or not

name: CoreHello
description: A hello messsage with a name

name: observedAttributes
description: The list of attribute to observe

name: rainbow

name: components/core-image/core-image.js
constructor
description: Initialize private fields, shadowRoot and the view

name: connectedCallback
description: Handle lazy-loading option when the element is appended to the DOM

name: disconnectedCallback
description:
Clean up possible lazy loading linsteners
when the element is disconnected with the DOM

name: fit
description:
The object-fit mode
chosen from [none, contain, cover, fill, scale-down]

name: lazy
description: If the lazy loading option is turned on

name: loading
description: Whether the image is still loading

name: error
description: Whether an error is detected when the image is beging loaded

name: imageStyle
description: CSS style of the image element

name: alignCenter
description: If the image should aligned at the center

name: _updateTemplate
description: Update the template so as to update the view

name: _handleLazyLoad
description: Load the image in the lazy-loading fashion

name: _addLazyLoadListener
description: Add a lazy loading linstener that listenes to lazy-loaded event

name: _getImageStyle
description: simulate object-fit behavior to compatible with IE11 and other browsers which not support object-fit

name: components/core-modal/core-modal.js
coreModal
description:
A modal that is triggered by any element that
has attribute 'modal' with the same value as the value of the 'name' attribute of it

name: connectedCallback
description:
When the web component is appended to the DOM,
1. Store references to some components of
2. Add click linsteners

name: disconnectedCallback
description: Clean up linsteners when the web component is disconnected with the DOM

name: _showModal
description: Show the modal content in a popup

content:
# Team thanO5 (Team 5) Web Components
*Team 5 code repository* 

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/ucsd-cse112/thanO5.svg?token=z2v5dXcEyJJpnTivhteB&branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/ucsd-cse112/thanO5)
[![Maintainability](https://api.codeclimate.com/v1/badges/c46bd5e7fe5cc18e9541/maintainability)](https://codeclimate.com/repos/5cbebc0cfbadb16720001ec7/maintainability)
[![Test Coverage](https://api.codeclimate.com/v1/badges/c46bd5e7fe5cc18e9541/test_coverage)](https://codeclimate.com/repos/5cbebc0cfbadb16720001ec7/test_coverage)
[![Sauce Test Status](https://saucelabs.com/buildstatus/team5thanos)](https://saucelabs.com/u/team5thanos)
![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)

## The Team
1. Dushyant Patel - **Lead**
2. Karissa Jacobsen - **Co-lead**
3. Brian Orensztein - **Quality Assurance**
4. Alex Iqbal - **DevOps**
5. Yufeng Gao - **DevOps**
6. Philip Kim - **Tool & Utility**
7. Danny Fung - **Tool & Utility**
8. Kevin Barron - **Coder**
9. John Lu - **Coder**
10. Rachel Barrow - **Coder**
 
## Getting Started
1. Make sure you have [Node Package Manager](https://nodejs.org/en/download/) (npm) installed.
2. Clone the repo/pull from the branch *master*
3. Download all necessary dependencies locally
	- `npm install`

## Unit Testing and Integration Testing
**To run all the unit and integration tests:**
- `npm test` or `npm run test`

A much more detailed guide and explanation to Unit Testing can be found [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1N5Mdvw3mUZzqnDy4j3Zy-UZNi_xN5Kv3ctdWr3Vi5T4/edit)

A much more detailed guide and explanation to Integration Testing can be found [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ZXp29jMGDu2BMSO8LRCvTIIiLbpRYNt_g1ojZT9xwA0/edit)

## Browser Testing
**To run all the browser tests:**
- `npm run browsertest`
- You may need to set up the SauceLabs access key and username environment variables locally.

A much more detailed guide and explanation to Browser Testing and how to set up the variables can be found [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1RcgaIx0Ty2WkElnowXgwl0UY5Z8WI2w-KNIHo9UeGPA/edit#)

## Acknowledgement
We would like to thank [SauceLabs](https://saucelabs.com/) for supporting open source projects like ours.
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "thanos",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Team 05 code repo",
  "main": "foo.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "npx karma start config/karma.conf.js",
    "browsertest": "testcafe saucelabs:chrome,saucelabs:safari tests/browser/*.test.js",
    "lint": "npx eslint './**/*.js' && npx htmllint *.html && npx stylelint components",
    "docs": "npx jsdoc -r components -c jsdoc.json -d docs",
    "build": "npx webpack --config config/webpack.prod.js",
    "build:watch": "npx webpack --config config/webpack.prod.js --watch",
    "serve": "npx webpack-dev-server --config config/webpack.dev.js",
    "storybook": "start-storybook"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/ucsd-cse112/thanO5.git"
  },
  "author": "",
  "license": "ISC",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/ucsd-cse112/thanO5/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/ucsd-cse112/thanO5#readme",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@storybook/addon-knobs": "^5.0.11",
    "@storybook/html": "^5.0.11",
    "@webcomponents/webcomponentsjs": "^2.2.10",
    "clean-webpack-plugin": "^2.0.1",
    "copy-webpack-plugin": "^5.0.3",
    "css-loader": "^2.1.1",
    "documentation": "^10.1.0",
    "element-theme-chalk": "^2.8.2",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^5.16.0",
    "eslint-config-google": "^0.12.0",
    "file-loader": "^3.0.1",
    "html-loader": "^0.5.5",
    "html-webpack-plugin": "^3.2.0",
    "htmllint-cli": "0.0.7",
    "husky": "^2.3.0",
    "istanbul-instrumenter-loader": "^3.0.1",
    "jasmine": "^3.4.0",
    "jsdoc": "^3.6.1",
    "karma": "^4.1.0",
    "karma-chrome-launcher": "^2.2.0",
    "karma-coverage": "^1.1.2",
    "karma-coverage-istanbul-reporter": "^2.0.5",
    "karma-edge-launcher": "^0.4.2",
    "karma-firefox-launcher": "^1.1.0",
    "karma-jasmine": "^2.0.1",
    "karma-opera-launcher": "^1.0.0",
    "karma-phantomjs-launcher": "^1.0.4",
    "karma-safari-launcher": "^1.0.0",
    "karma-sourcemap-loader": "^0.3.7",
    "karma-spec-reporter": "0.0.32",
    "karma-webpack": "^3.0.5",
    "lit-element": "^2.1.0",
    "node-sass": "^4.12.0",
    "raw-loader": "^2.0.0",
    "sass-loader": "^7.1.0",
    "style-loader": "^0.23.1",
    "stylelint": "^10.0.1",
    "stylelint-config-standard": "^18.3.0",
    "testcafe": "^1.1.4",
    "testcafe-browser-provider-saucelabs": "^1.7.0",
    "throttle-debounce": "^2.1.0",
    "url-loader": "^1.1.2",
    "vue": "^2.6.10",
    "webpack": "^4.30.0",
    "webpack-cli": "^3.3.1",
    "webpack-dev-server": "^3.3.1",
    "webpack-karma-jasmine": "^3.0.6",
    "webpack-merge": "^4.2.1"
  },
  "dependencies": {},
  "husky": {
    "hooks": {
      "pre-commit": "npm run lint"
    }
  }
}
name: package.json
